The Catholic Church needs to change in a few ways. They are losing followers because they are not very accepting of many things. This includes same-sex marriage, abortion, and birth control. The Catholic Church has strong views on these issues, but they are a little old-fashioned. If they adapted to more modern thinking, they might not lose so many followers.

Some people are turning against the Catholic Church because of its views on these issues. They see the Church as having the wrong view on many things. The Catholic Church is against abortion, so if you support abortion, you might not be comfortable in a Church that teaches it is wrong. The same is true for gay marriage. If you believe in it and want to practice it, you might not want to be in a Church that doesn't agree.

I don't see why priests can't be married or why there can't be female priests. The Catholic Church says priests are married to God and devoted to their work, but everyone else has a job and a family life. I don't see why priests can't have both.

If priests were allowed to be married or if there were female priests, it might not have changed the situation. However, it's hard to know for sure. What I do know is that many people are unhappy with the Catholic Church's views on these issues.

I think gay marriage is okay. I believe people are born gay. They don't choose to be gay. I think they should not be blamed for who they are.

I don't think it's right to say same-sex couples can't get married. It's not their choice. They are who they are.

It's not a choice, like being straight or left-handed. People are born that way. They should not be punished for their sexual orientation.

The federal government should not be involved in this issue. It's a personal matter. It's not a matter of national security or morality. They should not judge people for who they are.

Gay people should be treated with respect and kindness. They should not be hurt or punished for something they cannot change.

I think that's all I want to say.

I think gay marriage should be legal. Here's why:

There is no good reason not to. Many people believe that gay couples are a threat to the straight family. But that's not true. Their relationships are different, and that's okay. It's like two sides of the same coin. Heads and tails are different, but they are still the same coin.

Gay couples have the same rights as straight couples. They should be able to own property and get medical care. If a gay partner is sick, the other partner should be able to visit them in the hospital. This is a basic right.

Scientific studies show that gay couples are just like straight couples. They have the same things that make relationships successful. They love each other and work together.

Gay couples are not asking to get married in a church. They just want a marriage certificate from the government. This is a civil right, not a church matter.

It's like segregation - separate but not equal. If the government allows civil unions, why not marriage?

People worry about adoption and community issues. But gay couples are just like straight couples. They have the same roles and responsibilities.

Some people are concerned about children of gay couples. But this is a small issue. Children of gay couples are just like children of straight couples. They need love and support, not a label.

The government should be involved in this issue. They should make gay marriage legal in every state. The federal government should support this.

President Bush has strong views about gay marriage. But his views are based on his religion. This is not fair. The government should not enforce one group's morality on everyone else.

Some people are against gay marriage because they think gay people are damaged or have a personality defect. But this is not true. The American Psychological Association says so.

We should listen to experts, not just popular opinion. If we do, we might see things differently.

First, I work in a hospital pharmacy during the summer. 

Some people think that just because a medicine is illegal, it is not helpful. I do not agree. 

I think it is not a good idea to make a medicine available to the public if it is illegal. No, I do not think it is a good idea. However, I do think it is okay to use a medicine for medical reasons, even if it is illegal. 

There are medicines that are illegal but still helpful. For example, oxycodone, Vicodin, and Percocet are all controlled substances. We use them in the pharmacy because they are helpful. If we deny the benefits of marijuana just because it is illegal, that is not fair. 

Marijuana is not like alcohol. If you misuse marijuana, it can cause harm. But if you misuse alcohol, it can also cause harm. It is a difficult question. I think we should be able to use marijuana responsibly. We can do this by allowing it to become legal gradually, not all at once. 

If we remove the bad image of marijuana, people might use it responsibly. They might use it for medical reasons, which is a good thing. 

People think marijuana is bad because it is an illegal drug. But it is not as bad as heroin or cocaine. If we change the way people think about marijuana, they might use it responsibly.

I think the church has changed to fit the 21st century. It is not as strict as it used to be. When I was younger, I went to church every Sunday. I always wore a nice dress and matching shoes and purse. I attended a private school with my friends. We saw each other every weekend.

Now, the church has made changes. They now have a "teenager mass" that is only 30 minutes long. People dress more casually during the summer. They even wear beach clothes right after the beach. Families are often late for morning masses. People wear jeans and khakis instead of dressing up.

The biggest change I have noticed is this more casual atmosphere. That is the main thing about the church I know. I do not know about the church's politics.

Regarding the accusations of priests abusing children, I do not think these problems could have been avoided by changing the church's rules, such as allowing married priests or priests to marry. Some people who are married still abuse children. Their behavior is not because of their marital status.

It is also a person's choice to become a priest. There are other religions that allow married people to be clergy. They can still practice their faith and be married. If they want to do both, they might choose a different faith.

I think abuse is based on genetics. People are born with these feelings. Their upbringing may play a small part, but it is mostly their genetics. You cannot hide this through marriage. It would usually come out eventually. I do not think the church could have prevented this from happening.

If the church knew about the abuse and tried to cover it up, that is a serious issue. However, I do not think they knew in all cases. 

I do not have any other thoughts about the Catholic Church.

I want to talk about the Iraq War. The United States went to war in Iraq after the September 11th attacks in 2001. The Bush administration said that Saddam Hussein had weapons of mass destruction and that he was connected to Osama Bin Laden. But this was not true.

The Bush administration told many lies to the American people. Colin Powell, who was a high official, later said that he was not sure about the evidence when he presented it to the United Nations. This is very bad behavior for a government official.

The Bush administration did not respect the US Constitution and tried to limit its power. They wanted to go to war, but the Constitution says that the government must have a good reason to go to war.

Some people think that President Bush wanted to go to war because of his father's old problems with Saddam Hussein. Bush also wanted to get more oil from Iraq.

The war has gone on for a long time. If the US leaves now, there might be more problems and more people might die. The US and other countries are trying to work together to help Iraq, but it is not working well. The government in Iraq is not strong and has many problems.

I do not know what to say about this situation. I do not think that the US should have gone to war, but now we cannot just leave.

I have some thoughts about the War in Iraq.

First, I am not clear about the situation. I don't know the details. I think the war was not officially declared by the US government. It was a reaction to the attacks on the United States on September 11.

I don't think it's a good idea to stay in Iraq. Many people are unhappy about the war. We are using a lot of resources, and it's making a difficult situation worse. 

I also think about the Vietnam War. It was an undeclared war, and it's now considered a meaningless war. I don't want the same thing to happen with the War in Iraq.

But, I also think about the people in Iraq who have families and lives. They are suffering because of the war. We should consider their feelings.

It's hard for me to say what I think. I think we should leave Iraq, but I also think about the families who have loved ones there. If we leave, they will be unhappy, but if we stay, we will be changing their culture and making their lives worse.

I'm not sure what the best thing to do is. I think this situation will continue for a long time.

I don't think it's right for a state to make a law against a church. The constitution says there should be a separation of church and state. This means the government should not control what churches do. It is a clear statement in the constitution.

I think people who want to make a law against a church are choosing one church's ideas over another. Most Catholics and Christians don't want this law. But some people in Boston and other places support it.

I don't think the government should decide what churches can and cannot do. The separation of church and state is a key part of the constitution. It allows for freedom of religion in the United States.

Even if the government wanted to make an amendment to the constitution, I think it would be wrong. It would go against what is already written. And it would be one of the only amendments to take away people's rights rather than limit the government's power.

I don't think the government should be involved in this issue. The president's decision to push for this amendment seems to be based on his own Catholic beliefs. He wants one religion to be treated better than others.

It is up to the churches to decide what they want to do, not the government. There is no good reason for the amendment, except that the president thinks it's a good idea. It won't help the economy, but it might make society better.

I have said all I want to say on this issue.

The war in Iraq happened in 2003. Many Americans did not agree with the reasons the government gave for the war. They thought the government was not honest about the reasons for going to war. The government tried to connect the war in Iraq to the 9/11 attacks. However, this connection was not clear.

I am against war. I do not think the US government was ready for the consequences of war. Many American soldiers died in Iraq. This is very sad. The US removed the government of Iraq. But they did not plan well for the future.

The US government took out the Iraqi government. They wanted to put a new government in place. But they did not think about the problems that would come after. The US is still in Iraq now. Many Americans are still dying. The US is trying to help the Iraqi military and police learn to control their country.

The US government made it seem like the war in Iraq would be easy to win. But it is not easy to create a democracy. It took many years for the US to become a democratic country. The US government should have learned from their past mistakes.

In the 2004 presidential election, I thought about voting for President Bush. One reason was that I thought he should finish what he started. But now I am not sure. The US is still in Iraq after a long time. We took away their government and way of life. Should we leave now? That is a difficult question.

The US is risking many American lives in Iraq. Is it worth it? We went to war for a free democratic Iraq. But why not for other countries? I think it is really about oil. The US wants to control the oil in Iraq.

The government said Iraq had weapons of mass destruction. But they were not found. Other countries with weapons of mass destruction, like North Korea, are not being attacked. The US government is not being honest about their decisions.

I hope the war in Iraq ends soon and there is peace. But I am not sure that will happen.

I think gay marriage is right. I have always thought so. This is a personal matter. Many experts now say that a person's sexual preference is not their choice. It is in their body. They cannot change it.

The government should not control this. It is not a state issue. It is a personal and family matter. In my neighborhood, there are gay couples who are not married. But they behave like other families. They take care of their dogs and go for walks.

The President of the United States is trying to decide what marriage is. This is not his job. It is not right for him to decide.

Experts say that some people are born gay. It may be because of a chemical in their brain. It is not because of how they are raised. For example, if a boy has many sisters and no father, it does not make him gay.

Marriage is a private matter. If a man and a woman want to marry, they can do it in secret. But if two gay people want to marry, it is a public issue.

This should be a private matter, not a matter for the government or the country.

When you put something on the internet, it is public. Anyone can see it. This is very important to remember. As a resident advisor, I have seen this happen before. 

When you post something online, it can affect people's opinions about you. If you talk about something bad, like violence, someone will share it. The internet is open to everyone. If you are friends with someone on Myspace, you may see what they post.

This can be a problem. Schools may find out about something you posted. They cannot ignore it because they have to keep everyone safe. If something bad happens, they could have stopped it.

But it is also hard to know what to believe. Some people just make jokes online. For example, maybe someone in a class did an experiment that went wrong on purpose. Or it could be a real problem.

Recently, something happened at our school. Someone overheard someone talking about something, and they reported it. We found out who the person was, and we looked at their Facebook page. There were things on there that they meant as jokes, but they were taken seriously. 

When you post things online, it is like sharing them with everyone. You cannot control who sees them. If you don't want someone to know something, don't share it online. You cannot stop people from thinking what they want to think.

School officials should not friend their students on social media. They should not read their private messages either. But if someone brings something to their attention, they have to take it seriously.

As a resident advisor, I think it's best not to connect with my residents online. I don't want to know things that are not my business. If they post something on Facebook, I have to see it and deal with it. I don't want that connection.

I have a problem with the way the war has been going on for such a long time. I think the original goal was good - to help another country have a fair government. But now, I'm not sure the reason for the war is clear. We may be fighting just to show our power.

I think the war started for a good reason. We wanted to help a country with an unfair government. However, I'm not sure this is still the main reason we're fighting. Maybe we started for personal reasons, like to prove something. 

I think we already made our point in the beginning. We started the war to give democracy to a country that did not have a fair system. But now, the war has gone on for many years. This is a long time.

If our goal was to help a country ruled by a bad leader, that's a good reason for war. But I'm not sure that's still our goal. It seems we're just fighting because we want to fight.

I think the war has gone on long enough. The country we're helping will have to take care of itself soon. We should stop spending a lot of money on this war. We have problems in our own country that we should be solving, like poverty and poor schools.

We are spending billions of dollars on this war. This money could be used to fix problems in our own country. We need to spend our money on things that help our own citizens, like health care and roads.

I think we should stop the war because it's costly and not solving the problem we started with. We should focus on helping our own country instead.

You have a question. You think it's good that someone stopped something bad from happening because they looked at someone's information on the internet. This is on websites like Myspace or Facebook. If you put information on the internet, it's likely many people will see it. You can control who sees your information by accepting them as friends, but this means you are giving them permission to see it.

It's hard to control who sees information on the internet. One person can't look at everyone's profiles all the time. But if someone is looking at many profiles to prevent bad things from happening, it might be unfair. They might think only certain people are bad.

You have a Facebook account and it bothers you that strangers can see things about you. You saw a TV show about a man who easily got information about someone online. He got their screen name and talked to them on instant messenger in just a minute. This is why you limit what you put on Facebook, but you also want to stay in touch with friends.

Many people worry about this issue. Your roommate's high school banned students from having Myspace. But you're not sure if this is right. Can schools tell students what they can and can't do on the internet?

I am not sure about the Iraq War. It was a difficult decision. I do not like talking about it. Many people think it was a bad idea. Most people around the world do not agree with the decision to go to war. About 75 to 80 percent of people in the United States, Iraq, and other countries think the war was a bad idea.

Most U.S. soldiers in Iraq also think the war was a bad idea. They want to leave Iraq within a year. The country was already in trouble when the U.S. went in. Now it is hard to leave. There is a big difference between American culture and the culture in the Middle East. It is hard to bring democracy to countries where people want to make their own choices.

Saddam Hussein was a bad ruler, but the U.S. should have thought about the consequences before going to war. The situation in Iraq is like quicksand. It is hard to get out. I do not see a good reason to stay in Iraq. The U.S. government may have some ideas for staying, but I do not agree with them.

If the U.S. leaves Iraq slowly over time, I would not have a problem with that. But I do not see a reason to stay any longer than we should. Many Iraqis want the U.S. to leave within a year. Some want the U.S. to leave now. These are the people we are trying to help.

I think it is better to do what Iraqis want. If they tell us to leave, then it is not our responsibility if things go badly. If we decide to help them after they ask us to leave, we can be seen as trying to help. It is not easy to be seen as the good guy in the Middle East. But it is better than where we are now.

There is still a problem with men and women being treated unfairly in the United States. This problem is called gender discrimination.

In the US, women have an especially hard time. They often face a "glass ceiling" that prevents them from getting to the top of their jobs. Even when they have all the qualifications for a job, they may not get promoted because society has not seen many women in leadership positions in the past.

The same thing can happen to men in certain jobs, like in the fashion industry. People may not take them seriously if they are not like other men in the fashion industry. This can be because men in the fashion industry have different styles of life.

In many areas, men are expected to be the main earners of a family. If a man stays home to take care of the children, people may think it's strange. This can be hard for men who want to be with their children and help raise them.

In the fashion industry, people may not take men seriously if they are straight. They may think men who like fashion are not like other men.

To change this, we need to work slowly and carefully. We have made a lot of progress since the 1800s, but change is slow. As women get more jobs and become CEOs, people are starting to accept them more. The same is happening with men who stay home to take care of their children.

The key is to show people the good qualities of people who are often stereotyped. We should not push people to accept things too quickly. If we do, they will resist. Instead, we should show them the good qualities of these people, and they will start to accept them more.

We are at a good point right now, where people are starting to accept things more. However, we still have a long way to go. There are many areas where people are still discriminated against, not just because of their gender, but also because of where they are from or how they speak.

For example, people from rural areas may be looked down upon if they have poor grammar, even if they are very intelligent. This is another form of discrimination.

In conclusion, gender discrimination is a big problem in the US. We need to work slowly and carefully to fix it. We have made progress, but we still have a long way to go.

Marijuana was once against the law. But it's not anymore in some places. It's now like a traffic ticket. You get a fine instead of going to jail. 

This change can be good or bad. Some people think it's good because it saves money. It costs a lot to arrest people and put them in jail. It also costs money for the court and lawyers. 

Denver is a place where people are more open-minded. They think it's fine to have marijuana. They use the money to help the community. They spend it on schools, programs for older people, and food for those who are poor.

But some people don't think it's a good idea. They think it will make problems. There will be people smoking and driving. It's still not okay in many places to smoke marijuana. It will be awkward for a lot of people if it's everywhere.

Alcohol and marijuana are both bad for people. But in different ways. Alcohol can hurt your ability to drive. Marijuana can hurt your lifestyle. It can make you make bad choices.

People react differently to substances. Some people can handle them easily. Others can't. It's hard to say how marijuana will affect someone.

But both marijuana and alcohol can hurt people. They both have bad effects. It's good to be careful with them.

I am not sure about this issue. I have not made up my mind. I do not know if one side is right or the other. This is a difficult subject. It is about the relationship between church and state. It is also about how we define marriage. This is hard to do without hurting someone’s feelings.

Marriage is a union between two people. It is not just a sacrament. People should not get special treatment from the government just because they were baptized. If people are married, the government should not look at it as a religious thing. They should look at it as a civil union.

Two people who love each other should be able to make a union. They should not be judged. The fact that some people are gay is not important. They can also make a union.

If the states can agree on this, they should make it a federal law. But making a change to the constitution is too big a deal. It should not be changed just to ban gay marriage. This is not a big enough issue to make a change to the constitution.

I do not think it is important enough to make a change to the constitution. We should not change the constitution just to define marriage.

I was raised in a Christian home. This made me think about my views on homosexuality. I do not fully understand this issue. I have many gay friends, and I do not agree with their lifestyle. However, I think it should be legal. I do not think it should be a national issue. Each state should make its own decision about this.

I think if you live in a state that allows gay marriage, you should respect that state's decision. You chose to live there. I believe that homosexuals should have the same rights as heterosexuals. Therefore, I think gay marriage should be allowed in each state.

I have already answered this question. I do not agree with President Bush's decision to ban gay marriage. He should not make decisions for all the states. I do not think he should decide how each state should be governed. 

I think some things should be decided by each state. President Bush will leave office soon. If a new president is elected, he may change the law on gay marriage. I think each state should make its own decision about this issue. They will have to live with the decision.

No, I am not a supporter of President Bush on this issue.

I do not agree that the school officials overstepped their bounds. Myspace is a public place. If you put something on the internet, you should be prepared for others to see it. This includes school officials. They have the right to check Myspace to make sure students are safe. They can do this from their homes.

The school officials went on Myspace to prevent school shootings. Saving students' lives is a big responsibility of the school system. I think it is okay to check Myspace if it helps keep students safe.

Some people might think it is an invasion of privacy to check Myspace. But if it makes the school a better and safer place, I do not think it is an invasion. 

When you post something on Myspace, you should not expect to be private. Many people post things they do not want others to see. But once it is on the internet, it is hard to get it off. 

The school officials can find things you post on Myspace even if it is not under the school's name. They can use the internet to find out what students are doing.

If the school officials can use Myspace to make the school safer, I think it is okay. They should not just go on Myspace to catch students doing something wrong. 

One teacher told me that schools must make sure students are safe. We have to do drills in case of emergencies. This is to make the school a safer place.

The school officials were just trying to make the school safer. They were checking Myspace to prevent bad things from happening, like a school shooting.

I have mixed feelings about a war. At first, I supported it because I was affected by 9/11. I wanted to cause trouble for those who hurt us. However, I now think we made a mistake. We didn't think about the long-term results of our actions. We went into the war without a clear plan.

Things did not go well. We did not prepare well for the challenges we faced. War is different in their country than in ours. They fight in a savage way. They are not trying to make their country better; they just want us to leave.

I think we went to war to get revenge. The president decided to go to war because many people wanted to. We couldn't just ignore what happened and leave it alone. However, we should have had a better plan.

We didn't have unity and didn't know what we were doing. We created more problems than we solved. I don't think we are the ones to change them. They will always be the same.

We have made some progress, but not enough to stay. It will collapse when we leave. We are hurting ourselves by staying. We should not stay there forever.

The Catholic Church needs to change in a few ways. They are losing followers because they are not very accepting of many things. This includes same-sex marriage, abortion, and birth control. The Catholic Church has strong views on these issues, but they are a little old-fashioned. If they adapted to more modern thinking, they might not lose so many followers.

Some people are turning against the Catholic Church because of its views on these issues. They see the Church as having the wrong view on many things. The Catholic Church is against abortion, so if you support abortion, you might not be comfortable in a Church that teaches it is wrong. The same is true for gay marriage. If you believe in it and want to practice it, you might not want to be in a Church that doesn't agree.

I don't see why priests can't be married or why there can't be female priests. The Catholic Church says priests are married to God and devoted to their work, but everyone else has a job and a family life. I don't see why priests can't have both.

If priests were allowed to be married or if there were female priests, it might not have changed the situation. However, it's hard to know for sure. What I do know is that many people are unhappy with the Catholic Church's views on these issues.

I think gay marriage is okay. I believe people are born gay. They don't choose to be gay. I think they should not be blamed for who they are.

I don't think it's right to say same-sex couples can't get married. It's not their choice. They are who they are.

It's not a choice, like being straight or left-handed. People are born that way. They should not be punished for their sexual orientation.

The federal government should not be involved in this issue. It's a personal matter. It's not a matter of national security or morality. They should not judge people for who they are.

Gay people should be treated with respect and kindness. They should not be hurt or punished for something they cannot change.

I think that's all I want to say.

I think gay marriage should be legal. Here's why:

There is no good reason not to. Many people believe that gay couples are a threat to the straight family. But that's not true. Their relationships are different, and that's okay. It's like two sides of the same coin. Heads and tails are different, but they are still the same coin.

Gay couples have the same rights as straight couples. They should be able to own property and get medical care. If a gay partner is sick, the other partner should be able to visit them in the hospital. This is a basic right.

Scientific studies show that gay couples are just like straight couples. They have the same things that make relationships successful. They love each other and work together.

Gay couples are not asking to get married in a church. They just want a marriage certificate from the government. This is a civil right, not a church matter.

It's like segregation - separate but not equal. If the government allows civil unions, why not marriage?

People worry about adoption and community issues. But gay couples are just like straight couples. They have the same roles and responsibilities.

Some people are concerned about children of gay couples. But this is a small issue. Children of gay couples are just like children of straight couples. They need love and support, not a label.

The government should be involved in this issue. They should make gay marriage legal in every state. The federal government should support this.

President Bush has strong views about gay marriage. But his views are based on his religion. This is not fair. The government should not enforce one group's morality on everyone else.

Some people are against gay marriage because they think gay people are damaged or have a personality defect. But this is not true. The American Psychological Association says so.

We should listen to experts, not just popular opinion. If we do, we might see things differently.

First, I work in a hospital pharmacy during the summer. 

Some people think that just because a medicine is illegal, it is not helpful. I do not agree. 

I think it is not a good idea to make a medicine available to the public if it is illegal. No, I do not think it is a good idea. However, I do think it is okay to use a medicine for medical reasons, even if it is illegal. 

There are medicines that are illegal but still helpful. For example, oxycodone, Vicodin, and Percocet are all controlled substances. We use them in the pharmacy because they are helpful. If we deny the benefits of marijuana just because it is illegal, that is not fair. 

Marijuana is not like alcohol. If you misuse marijuana, it can cause harm. But if you misuse alcohol, it can also cause harm. It is a difficult question. I think we should be able to use marijuana responsibly. We can do this by allowing it to become legal gradually, not all at once. 

If we remove the bad image of marijuana, people might use it responsibly. They might use it for medical reasons, which is a good thing. 

People think marijuana is bad because it is an illegal drug. But it is not as bad as heroin or cocaine. If we change the way people think about marijuana, they might use it responsibly.

I think the church has changed to fit the 21st century. It is not as strict as it used to be. When I was younger, I went to church every Sunday. I always wore a nice dress and matching shoes and purse. I attended a private school with my friends. We saw each other every weekend.

Now, the church has made changes. They now have a "teenager mass" that is only 30 minutes long. People dress more casually during the summer. They even wear beach clothes right after the beach. Families are often late for morning masses. People wear jeans and khakis instead of dressing up.

The biggest change I have noticed is this more casual atmosphere. That is the main thing about the church I know. I do not know about the church's politics.

Regarding the accusations of priests abusing children, I do not think these problems could have been avoided by changing the church's rules, such as allowing married priests or priests to marry. Some people who are married still abuse children. Their behavior is not because of their marital status.

It is also a person's choice to become a priest. There are other religions that allow married people to be clergy. They can still practice their faith and be married. If they want to do both, they might choose a different faith.

I think abuse is based on genetics. People are born with these feelings. Their upbringing may play a small part, but it is mostly their genetics. You cannot hide this through marriage. It would usually come out eventually. I do not think the church could have prevented this from happening.

If the church knew about the abuse and tried to cover it up, that is a serious issue. However, I do not think they knew in all cases. 

I do not have any other thoughts about the Catholic Church.

I want to talk about the Iraq War. The United States went to war in Iraq after the September 11th attacks in 2001. The Bush administration said that Saddam Hussein had weapons of mass destruction and that he was connected to Osama Bin Laden. But this was not true.

The Bush administration told many lies to the American people. Colin Powell, who was a high official, later said that he was not sure about the evidence when he presented it to the United Nations. This is very bad behavior for a government official.

The Bush administration did not respect the US Constitution and tried to limit its power. They wanted to go to war, but the Constitution says that the government must have a good reason to go to war.

Some people think that President Bush wanted to go to war because of his father's old problems with Saddam Hussein. Bush also wanted to get more oil from Iraq.

The war has gone on for a long time. If the US leaves now, there might be more problems and more people might die. The US and other countries are trying to work together to help Iraq, but it is not working well. The government in Iraq is not strong and has many problems.

I do not know what to say about this situation. I do not think that the US should have gone to war, but now we cannot just leave.

I have some thoughts about the War in Iraq.

First, I am not clear about the situation. I don't know the details. I think the war was not officially declared by the US government. It was a reaction to the attacks on the United States on September 11.

I don't think it's a good idea to stay in Iraq. Many people are unhappy about the war. We are using a lot of resources, and it's making a difficult situation worse. 

I also think about the Vietnam War. It was an undeclared war, and it's now considered a meaningless war. I don't want the same thing to happen with the War in Iraq.

But, I also think about the people in Iraq who have families and lives. They are suffering because of the war. We should consider their feelings.

It's hard for me to say what I think. I think we should leave Iraq, but I also think about the families who have loved ones there. If we leave, they will be unhappy, but if we stay, we will be changing their culture and making their lives worse.

I'm not sure what the best thing to do is. I think this situation will continue for a long time.

I don't think it's right for a state to make a law against a church. The constitution says there should be a separation of church and state. This means the government should not control what churches do. It is a clear statement in the constitution.

I think people who want to make a law against a church are choosing one church's ideas over another. Most Catholics and Christians don't want this law. But some people in Boston and other places support it.

I don't think the government should decide what churches can and cannot do. The separation of church and state is a key part of the constitution. It allows for freedom of religion in the United States.

Even if the government wanted to make an amendment to the constitution, I think it would be wrong. It would go against what is already written. And it would be one of the only amendments to take away people's rights rather than limit the government's power.

I don't think the government should be involved in this issue. The president's decision to push for this amendment seems to be based on his own Catholic beliefs. He wants one religion to be treated better than others.

It is up to the churches to decide what they want to do, not the government. There is no good reason for the amendment, except that the president thinks it's a good idea. It won't help the economy, but it might make society better.

I have said all I want to say on this issue.

The war in Iraq happened in 2003. Many Americans did not agree with the reasons the government gave for the war. They thought the government was not honest about the reasons for going to war. The government tried to connect the war in Iraq to the 9/11 attacks. However, this connection was not clear.

I am against war. I do not think the US government was ready for the consequences of war. Many American soldiers died in Iraq. This is very sad. The US removed the government of Iraq. But they did not plan well for the future.

The US government took out the Iraqi government. They wanted to put a new government in place. But they did not think about the problems that would come after. The US is still in Iraq now. Many Americans are still dying. The US is trying to help the Iraqi military and police learn to control their country.

The US government made it seem like the war in Iraq would be easy to win. But it is not easy to create a democracy. It took many years for the US to become a democratic country. The US government should have learned from their past mistakes.

In the 2004 presidential election, I thought about voting for President Bush. One reason was that I thought he should finish what he started. But now I am not sure. The US is still in Iraq after a long time. We took away their government and way of life. Should we leave now? That is a difficult question.

The US is risking many American lives in Iraq. Is it worth it? We went to war for a free democratic Iraq. But why not for other countries? I think it is really about oil. The US wants to control the oil in Iraq.

The government said Iraq had weapons of mass destruction. But they were not found. Other countries with weapons of mass destruction, like North Korea, are not being attacked. The US government is not being honest about their decisions.

I hope the war in Iraq ends soon and there is peace. But I am not sure that will happen.

I think gay marriage is right. I have always thought so. This is a personal matter. Many experts now say that a person's sexual preference is not their choice. It is in their body. They cannot change it.

The government should not control this. It is not a state issue. It is a personal and family matter. In my neighborhood, there are gay couples who are not married. But they behave like other families. They take care of their dogs and go for walks.

The President of the United States is trying to decide what marriage is. This is not his job. It is not right for him to decide.

Experts say that some people are born gay. It may be because of a chemical in their brain. It is not because of how they are raised. For example, if a boy has many sisters and no father, it does not make him gay.

Marriage is a private matter. If a man and a woman want to marry, they can do it in secret. But if two gay people want to marry, it is a public issue.

This should be a private matter, not a matter for the government or the country.

When you put something on the internet, it is public. Anyone can see it. This is very important to remember. As a resident advisor, I have seen this happen before. 

When you post something online, it can affect people's opinions about you. If you talk about something bad, like violence, someone will share it. The internet is open to everyone. If you are friends with someone on Myspace, you may see what they post.

This can be a problem. Schools may find out about something you posted. They cannot ignore it because they have to keep everyone safe. If something bad happens, they could have stopped it.

But it is also hard to know what to believe. Some people just make jokes online. For example, maybe someone in a class did an experiment that went wrong on purpose. Or it could be a real problem.

Recently, something happened at our school. Someone overheard someone talking about something, and they reported it. We found out who the person was, and we looked at their Facebook page. There were things on there that they meant as jokes, but they were taken seriously. 

When you post things online, it is like sharing them with everyone. You cannot control who sees them. If you don't want someone to know something, don't share it online. You cannot stop people from thinking what they want to think.

School officials should not friend their students on social media. They should not read their private messages either. But if someone brings something to their attention, they have to take it seriously.

As a resident advisor, I think it's best not to connect with my residents online. I don't want to know things that are not my business. If they post something on Facebook, I have to see it and deal with it. I don't want that connection.

I have a problem with the way the war has been going on for such a long time. I think the original goal was good - to help another country have a fair government. But now, I'm not sure the reason for the war is clear. We may be fighting just to show our power.

I think the war started for a good reason. We wanted to help a country with an unfair government. However, I'm not sure this is still the main reason we're fighting. Maybe we started for personal reasons, like to prove something. 

I think we already made our point in the beginning. We started the war to give democracy to a country that did not have a fair system. But now, the war has gone on for many years. This is a long time.

If our goal was to help a country ruled by a bad leader, that's a good reason for war. But I'm not sure that's still our goal. It seems we're just fighting because we want to fight.

I think the war has gone on long enough. The country we're helping will have to take care of itself soon. We should stop spending a lot of money on this war. We have problems in our own country that we should be solving, like poverty and poor schools.

We are spending billions of dollars on this war. This money could be used to fix problems in our own country. We need to spend our money on things that help our own citizens, like health care and roads.

I think we should stop the war because it's costly and not solving the problem we started with. We should focus on helping our own country instead.

You have a question. You think it's good that someone stopped something bad from happening because they looked at someone's information on the internet. This is on websites like Myspace or Facebook. If you put information on the internet, it's likely many people will see it. You can control who sees your information by accepting them as friends, but this means you are giving them permission to see it.

It's hard to control who sees information on the internet. One person can't look at everyone's profiles all the time. But if someone is looking at many profiles to prevent bad things from happening, it might be unfair. They might think only certain people are bad.

You have a Facebook account and it bothers you that strangers can see things about you. You saw a TV show about a man who easily got information about someone online. He got their screen name and talked to them on instant messenger in just a minute. This is why you limit what you put on Facebook, but you also want to stay in touch with friends.

Many people worry about this issue. Your roommate's high school banned students from having Myspace. But you're not sure if this is right. Can schools tell students what they can and can't do on the internet?

I am not sure about the Iraq War. It was a difficult decision. I do not like talking about it. Many people think it was a bad idea. Most people around the world do not agree with the decision to go to war. About 75 to 80 percent of people in the United States, Iraq, and other countries think the war was a bad idea.

Most U.S. soldiers in Iraq also think the war was a bad idea. They want to leave Iraq within a year. The country was already in trouble when the U.S. went in. Now it is hard to leave. There is a big difference between American culture and the culture in the Middle East. It is hard to bring democracy to countries where people want to make their own choices.

Saddam Hussein was a bad ruler, but the U.S. should have thought about the consequences before going to war. The situation in Iraq is like quicksand. It is hard to get out. I do not see a good reason to stay in Iraq. The U.S. government may have some ideas for staying, but I do not agree with them.

If the U.S. leaves Iraq slowly over time, I would not have a problem with that. But I do not see a reason to stay any longer than we should. Many Iraqis want the U.S. to leave within a year. Some want the U.S. to leave now. These are the people we are trying to help.

I think it is better to do what Iraqis want. If they tell us to leave, then it is not our responsibility if things go badly. If we decide to help them after they ask us to leave, we can be seen as trying to help. It is not easy to be seen as the good guy in the Middle East. But it is better than where we are now.

There is still a problem with men and women being treated unfairly in the United States. This problem is called gender discrimination.

In the US, women have an especially hard time. They often face a "glass ceiling" that prevents them from getting to the top of their jobs. Even when they have all the qualifications for a job, they may not get promoted because society has not seen many women in leadership positions in the past.

The same thing can happen to men in certain jobs, like in the fashion industry. People may not take them seriously if they are not like other men in the fashion industry. This can be because men in the fashion industry have different styles of life.

In many areas, men are expected to be the main earners of a family. If a man stays home to take care of the children, people may think it's strange. This can be hard for men who want to be with their children and help raise them.

In the fashion industry, people may not take men seriously if they are straight. They may think men who like fashion are not like other men.

To change this, we need to work slowly and carefully. We have made a lot of progress since the 1800s, but change is slow. As women get more jobs and become CEOs, people are starting to accept them more. The same is happening with men who stay home to take care of their children.

The key is to show people the good qualities of people who are often stereotyped. We should not push people to accept things too quickly. If we do, they will resist. Instead, we should show them the good qualities of these people, and they will start to accept them more.

We are at a good point right now, where people are starting to accept things more. However, we still have a long way to go. There are many areas where people are still discriminated against, not just because of their gender, but also because of where they are from or how they speak.

For example, people from rural areas may be looked down upon if they have poor grammar, even if they are very intelligent. This is another form of discrimination.

In conclusion, gender discrimination is a big problem in the US. We need to work slowly and carefully to fix it. We have made progress, but we still have a long way to go.

Marijuana was once against the law. But it's not anymore in some places. It's now like a traffic ticket. You get a fine instead of going to jail. 

This change can be good or bad. Some people think it's good because it saves money. It costs a lot to arrest people and put them in jail. It also costs money for the court and lawyers. 

Denver is a place where people are more open-minded. They think it's fine to have marijuana. They use the money to help the community. They spend it on schools, programs for older people, and food for those who are poor.

But some people don't think it's a good idea. They think it will make problems. There will be people smoking and driving. It's still not okay in many places to smoke marijuana. It will be awkward for a lot of people if it's everywhere.

Alcohol and marijuana are both bad for people. But in different ways. Alcohol can hurt your ability to drive. Marijuana can hurt your lifestyle. It can make you make bad choices.

People react differently to substances. Some people can handle them easily. Others can't. It's hard to say how marijuana will affect someone.

But both marijuana and alcohol can hurt people. They both have bad effects. It's good to be careful with them.

I am not sure about this issue. I have not made up my mind. I do not know if one side is right or the other. This is a difficult subject. It is about the relationship between church and state. It is also about how we define marriage. This is hard to do without hurting someone’s feelings.

Marriage is a union between two people. It is not just a sacrament. People should not get special treatment from the government just because they were baptized. If people are married, the government should not look at it as a religious thing. They should look at it as a civil union.

Two people who love each other should be able to make a union. They should not be judged. The fact that some people are gay is not important. They can also make a union.

If the states can agree on this, they should make it a federal law. But making a change to the constitution is too big a deal. It should not be changed just to ban gay marriage. This is not a big enough issue to make a change to the constitution.

I do not think it is important enough to make a change to the constitution. We should not change the constitution just to define marriage.

I was raised in a Christian home. This made me think about my views on homosexuality. I do not fully understand this issue. I have many gay friends, and I do not agree with their lifestyle. However, I think it should be legal. I do not think it should be a national issue. Each state should make its own decision about this.

I think if you live in a state that allows gay marriage, you should respect that state's decision. You chose to live there. I believe that homosexuals should have the same rights as heterosexuals. Therefore, I think gay marriage should be allowed in each state.

I have already answered this question. I do not agree with President Bush's decision to ban gay marriage. He should not make decisions for all the states. I do not think he should decide how each state should be governed. 

I think some things should be decided by each state. President Bush will leave office soon. If a new president is elected, he may change the law on gay marriage. I think each state should make its own decision about this issue. They will have to live with the decision.

No, I am not a supporter of President Bush on this issue.

I do not agree that the school officials overstepped their bounds. Myspace is a public place. If you put something on the internet, you should be prepared for others to see it. This includes school officials. They have the right to check Myspace to make sure students are safe. They can do this from their homes.

The school officials went on Myspace to prevent school shootings. Saving students' lives is a big responsibility of the school system. I think it is okay to check Myspace if it helps keep students safe.

Some people might think it is an invasion of privacy to check Myspace. But if it makes the school a better and safer place, I do not think it is an invasion. 

When you post something on Myspace, you should not expect to be private. Many people post things they do not want others to see. But once it is on the internet, it is hard to get it off. 

The school officials can find things you post on Myspace even if it is not under the school's name. They can use the internet to find out what students are doing.

If the school officials can use Myspace to make the school safer, I think it is okay. They should not just go on Myspace to catch students doing something wrong. 

One teacher told me that schools must make sure students are safe. We have to do drills in case of emergencies. This is to make the school a safer place.

The school officials were just trying to make the school safer. They were checking Myspace to prevent bad things from happening, like a school shooting.

I have mixed feelings about a war. At first, I supported it because I was affected by 9/11. I wanted to cause trouble for those who hurt us. However, I now think we made a mistake. We didn't think about the long-term results of our actions. We went into the war without a clear plan.

Things did not go well. We did not prepare well for the challenges we faced. War is different in their country than in ours. They fight in a savage way. They are not trying to make their country better; they just want us to leave.

I think we went to war to get revenge. The president decided to go to war because many people wanted to. We couldn't just ignore what happened and leave it alone. However, we should have had a better plan.

We didn't have unity and didn't know what we were doing. We created more problems than we solved. I don't think we are the ones to change them. They will always be the same.

We have made some progress, but not enough to stay. It will collapse when we leave. We are hurting ourselves by staying. We should not stay there forever.

The Catholic Church needs to change in a few ways. They are losing followers because they are not very accepting of many things. This includes same-sex marriage, abortion, and birth control. The Catholic Church has strong views on these issues, but they are a little old-fashioned. If they adapted to more modern thinking, they might not lose so many followers.

Some people are turning against the Catholic Church because of its views on these issues. They see the Church as having the wrong view on many things. The Catholic Church is against abortion, so if you support abortion, you might not be comfortable in a Church that teaches it is wrong. The same is true for gay marriage. If you believe in it and want to practice it, you might not want to be in a Church that doesn't agree.

I don't see why priests can't be married or why there can't be female priests. The Catholic Church says priests are married to God and devoted to their work, but everyone else has a job and a family life. I don't see why priests can't have both.

If priests were allowed to be married or if there were female priests, it might not have changed the situation. However, it's hard to know for sure. What I do know is that many people are unhappy with the Catholic Church's views on these issues.

I think gay marriage is okay. I believe people are born gay. They don't choose to be gay. I think they should not be blamed for who they are.

I don't think it's right to say same-sex couples can't get married. It's not their choice. They are who they are.

It's not a choice, like being straight or left-handed. People are born that way. They should not be punished for their sexual orientation.

The federal government should not be involved in this issue. It's a personal matter. It's not a matter of national security or morality. They should not judge people for who they are.

Gay people should be treated with respect and kindness. They should not be hurt or punished for something they cannot change.

I think that's all I want to say.

I think gay marriage should be legal. Here's why:

There is no good reason not to. Many people believe that gay couples are a threat to the straight family. But that's not true. Their relationships are different, and that's okay. It's like two sides of the same coin. Heads and tails are different, but they are still the same coin.

Gay couples have the same rights as straight couples. They should be able to own property and get medical care. If a gay partner is sick, the other partner should be able to visit them in the hospital. This is a basic right.

Scientific studies show that gay couples are just like straight couples. They have the same things that make relationships successful. They love each other and work together.

Gay couples are not asking to get married in a church. They just want a marriage certificate from the government. This is a civil right, not a church matter.

It's like segregation - separate but not equal. If the government allows civil unions, why not marriage?

People worry about adoption and community issues. But gay couples are just like straight couples. They have the same roles and responsibilities.

Some people are concerned about children of gay couples. But this is a small issue. Children of gay couples are just like children of straight couples. They need love and support, not a label.

The government should be involved in this issue. They should make gay marriage legal in every state. The federal government should support this.

President Bush has strong views about gay marriage. But his views are based on his religion. This is not fair. The government should not enforce one group's morality on everyone else.

Some people are against gay marriage because they think gay people are damaged or have a personality defect. But this is not true. The American Psychological Association says so.

We should listen to experts, not just popular opinion. If we do, we might see things differently.

First, I work in a hospital pharmacy during the summer. 

Some people think that just because a medicine is illegal, it is not helpful. I do not agree. 

I think it is not a good idea to make a medicine available to the public if it is illegal. No, I do not think it is a good idea. However, I do think it is okay to use a medicine for medical reasons, even if it is illegal. 

There are medicines that are illegal but still helpful. For example, oxycodone, Vicodin, and Percocet are all controlled substances. We use them in the pharmacy because they are helpful. If we deny the benefits of marijuana just because it is illegal, that is not fair. 

Marijuana is not like alcohol. If you misuse marijuana, it can cause harm. But if you misuse alcohol, it can also cause harm. It is a difficult question. I think we should be able to use marijuana responsibly. We can do this by allowing it to become legal gradually, not all at once. 

If we remove the bad image of marijuana, people might use it responsibly. They might use it for medical reasons, which is a good thing. 

People think marijuana is bad because it is an illegal drug. But it is not as bad as heroin or cocaine. If we change the way people think about marijuana, they might use it responsibly.

I think the church has changed to fit the 21st century. It is not as strict as it used to be. When I was younger, I went to church every Sunday. I always wore a nice dress and matching shoes and purse. I attended a private school with my friends. We saw each other every weekend.

Now, the church has made changes. They now have a "teenager mass" that is only 30 minutes long. People dress more casually during the summer. They even wear beach clothes right after the beach. Families are often late for morning masses. People wear jeans and khakis instead of dressing up.

The biggest change I have noticed is this more casual atmosphere. That is the main thing about the church I know. I do not know about the church's politics.

Regarding the accusations of priests abusing children, I do not think these problems could have been avoided by changing the church's rules, such as allowing married priests or priests to marry. Some people who are married still abuse children. Their behavior is not because of their marital status.

It is also a person's choice to become a priest. There are other religions that allow married people to be clergy. They can still practice their faith and be married. If they want to do both, they might choose a different faith.

I think abuse is based on genetics. People are born with these feelings. Their upbringing may play a small part, but it is mostly their genetics. You cannot hide this through marriage. It would usually come out eventually. I do not think the church could have prevented this from happening.

If the church knew about the abuse and tried to cover it up, that is a serious issue. However, I do not think they knew in all cases. 

I do not have any other thoughts about the Catholic Church.

I want to talk about the Iraq War. The United States went to war in Iraq after the September 11th attacks in 2001. The Bush administration said that Saddam Hussein had weapons of mass destruction and that he was connected to Osama Bin Laden. But this was not true.

The Bush administration told many lies to the American people. Colin Powell, who was a high official, later said that he was not sure about the evidence when he presented it to the United Nations. This is very bad behavior for a government official.

The Bush administration did not respect the US Constitution and tried to limit its power. They wanted to go to war, but the Constitution says that the government must have a good reason to go to war.

Some people think that President Bush wanted to go to war because of his father's old problems with Saddam Hussein. Bush also wanted to get more oil from Iraq.

The war has gone on for a long time. If the US leaves now, there might be more problems and more people might die. The US and other countries are trying to work together to help Iraq, but it is not working well. The government in Iraq is not strong and has many problems.

I do not know what to say about this situation. I do not think that the US should have gone to war, but now we cannot just leave.

I have some thoughts about the War in Iraq.

First, I am not clear about the situation. I don't know the details. I think the war was not officially declared by the US government. It was a reaction to the attacks on the United States on September 11.

I don't think it's a good idea to stay in Iraq. Many people are unhappy about the war. We are using a lot of resources, and it's making a difficult situation worse. 

I also think about the Vietnam War. It was an undeclared war, and it's now considered a meaningless war. I don't want the same thing to happen with the War in Iraq.

But, I also think about the people in Iraq who have families and lives. They are suffering because of the war. We should consider their feelings.

It's hard for me to say what I think. I think we should leave Iraq, but I also think about the families who have loved ones there. If we leave, they will be unhappy, but if we stay, we will be changing their culture and making their lives worse.

I'm not sure what the best thing to do is. I think this situation will continue for a long time.

I don't think it's right for a state to make a law against a church. The constitution says there should be a separation of church and state. This means the government should not control what churches do. It is a clear statement in the constitution.

I think people who want to make a law against a church are choosing one church's ideas over another. Most Catholics and Christians don't want this law. But some people in Boston and other places support it.

I don't think the government should decide what churches can and cannot do. The separation of church and state is a key part of the constitution. It allows for freedom of religion in the United States.

Even if the government wanted to make an amendment to the constitution, I think it would be wrong. It would go against what is already written. And it would be one of the only amendments to take away people's rights rather than limit the government's power.

I don't think the government should be involved in this issue. The president's decision to push for this amendment seems to be based on his own Catholic beliefs. He wants one religion to be treated better than others.

It is up to the churches to decide what they want to do, not the government. There is no good reason for the amendment, except that the president thinks it's a good idea. It won't help the economy, but it might make society better.

I have said all I want to say on this issue.

The war in Iraq happened in 2003. Many Americans did not agree with the reasons the government gave for the war. They thought the government was not honest about the reasons for going to war. The government tried to connect the war in Iraq to the 9/11 attacks. However, this connection was not clear.

I am against war. I do not think the US government was ready for the consequences of war. Many American soldiers died in Iraq. This is very sad. The US removed the government of Iraq. But they did not plan well for the future.

The US government took out the Iraqi government. They wanted to put a new government in place. But they did not think about the problems that would come after. The US is still in Iraq now. Many Americans are still dying. The US is trying to help the Iraqi military and police learn to control their country.

The US government made it seem like the war in Iraq would be easy to win. But it is not easy to create a democracy. It took many years for the US to become a democratic country. The US government should have learned from their past mistakes.

In the 2004 presidential election, I thought about voting for President Bush. One reason was that I thought he should finish what he started. But now I am not sure. The US is still in Iraq after a long time. We took away their government and way of life. Should we leave now? That is a difficult question.

The US is risking many American lives in Iraq. Is it worth it? We went to war for a free democratic Iraq. But why not for other countries? I think it is really about oil. The US wants to control the oil in Iraq.

The government said Iraq had weapons of mass destruction. But they were not found. Other countries with weapons of mass destruction, like North Korea, are not being attacked. The US government is not being honest about their decisions.

I hope the war in Iraq ends soon and there is peace. But I am not sure that will happen.

I think gay marriage is right. I have always thought so. This is a personal matter. Many experts now say that a person's sexual preference is not their choice. It is in their body. They cannot change it.

The government should not control this. It is not a state issue. It is a personal and family matter. In my neighborhood, there are gay couples who are not married. But they behave like other families. They take care of their dogs and go for walks.

The President of the United States is trying to decide what marriage is. This is not his job. It is not right for him to decide.

Experts say that some people are born gay. It may be because of a chemical in their brain. It is not because of how they are raised. For example, if a boy has many sisters and no father, it does not make him gay.

Marriage is a private matter. If a man and a woman want to marry, they can do it in secret. But if two gay people want to marry, it is a public issue.

This should be a private matter, not a matter for the government or the country.

When you put something on the internet, it is public. Anyone can see it. This is very important to remember. As a resident advisor, I have seen this happen before. 

When you post something online, it can affect people's opinions about you. If you talk about something bad, like violence, someone will share it. The internet is open to everyone. If you are friends with someone on Myspace, you may see what they post.

This can be a problem. Schools may find out about something you posted. They cannot ignore it because they have to keep everyone safe. If something bad happens, they could have stopped it.

But it is also hard to know what to believe. Some people just make jokes online. For example, maybe someone in a class did an experiment that went wrong on purpose. Or it could be a real problem.

Recently, something happened at our school. Someone overheard someone talking about something, and they reported it. We found out who the person was, and we looked at their Facebook page. There were things on there that they meant as jokes, but they were taken seriously. 

When you post things online, it is like sharing them with everyone. You cannot control who sees them. If you don't want someone to know something, don't share it online. You cannot stop people from thinking what they want to think.

School officials should not friend their students on social media. They should not read their private messages either. But if someone brings something to their attention, they have to take it seriously.

As a resident advisor, I think it's best not to connect with my residents online. I don't want to know things that are not my business. If they post something on Facebook, I have to see it and deal with it. I don't want that connection.

I have a problem with the way the war has been going on for such a long time. I think the original goal was good - to help another country have a fair government. But now, I'm not sure the reason for the war is clear. We may be fighting just to show our power.

I think the war started for a good reason. We wanted to help a country with an unfair government. However, I'm not sure this is still the main reason we're fighting. Maybe we started for personal reasons, like to prove something. 

I think we already made our point in the beginning. We started the war to give democracy to a country that did not have a fair system. But now, the war has gone on for many years. This is a long time.

If our goal was to help a country ruled by a bad leader, that's a good reason for war. But I'm not sure that's still our goal. It seems we're just fighting because we want to fight.

I think the war has gone on long enough. The country we're helping will have to take care of itself soon. We should stop spending a lot of money on this war. We have problems in our own country that we should be solving, like poverty and poor schools.

We are spending billions of dollars on this war. This money could be used to fix problems in our own country. We need to spend our money on things that help our own citizens, like health care and roads.

I think we should stop the war because it's costly and not solving the problem we started with. We should focus on helping our own country instead.

You have a question. You think it's good that someone stopped something bad from happening because they looked at someone's information on the internet. This is on websites like Myspace or Facebook. If you put information on the internet, it's likely many people will see it. You can control who sees your information by accepting them as friends, but this means you are giving them permission to see it.

It's hard to control who sees information on the internet. One person can't look at everyone's profiles all the time. But if someone is looking at many profiles to prevent bad things from happening, it might be unfair. They might think only certain people are bad.

You have a Facebook account and it bothers you that strangers can see things about you. You saw a TV show about a man who easily got information about someone online. He got their screen name and talked to them on instant messenger in just a minute. This is why you limit what you put on Facebook, but you also want to stay in touch with friends.

Many people worry about this issue. Your roommate's high school banned students from having Myspace. But you're not sure if this is right. Can schools tell students what they can and can't do on the internet?

I am not sure about the Iraq War. It was a difficult decision. I do not like talking about it. Many people think it was a bad idea. Most people around the world do not agree with the decision to go to war. About 75 to 80 percent of people in the United States, Iraq, and other countries think the war was a bad idea.

Most U.S. soldiers in Iraq also think the war was a bad idea. They want to leave Iraq within a year. The country was already in trouble when the U.S. went in. Now it is hard to leave. There is a big difference between American culture and the culture in the Middle East. It is hard to bring democracy to countries where people want to make their own choices.

Saddam Hussein was a bad ruler, but the U.S. should have thought about the consequences before going to war. The situation in Iraq is like quicksand. It is hard to get out. I do not see a good reason to stay in Iraq. The U.S. government may have some ideas for staying, but I do not agree with them.

If the U.S. leaves Iraq slowly over time, I would not have a problem with that. But I do not see a reason to stay any longer than we should. Many Iraqis want the U.S. to leave within a year. Some want the U.S. to leave now. These are the people we are trying to help.

I think it is better to do what Iraqis want. If they tell us to leave, then it is not our responsibility if things go badly. If we decide to help them after they ask us to leave, we can be seen as trying to help. It is not easy to be seen as the good guy in the Middle East. But it is better than where we are now.

There is still a problem with men and women being treated unfairly in the United States. This problem is called gender discrimination.

In the US, women have an especially hard time. They often face a "glass ceiling" that prevents them from getting to the top of their jobs. Even when they have all the qualifications for a job, they may not get promoted because society has not seen many women in leadership positions in the past.

The same thing can happen to men in certain jobs, like in the fashion industry. People may not take them seriously if they are not like other men in the fashion industry. This can be because men in the fashion industry have different styles of life.

In many areas, men are expected to be the main earners of a family. If a man stays home to take care of the children, people may think it's strange. This can be hard for men who want to be with their children and help raise them.

In the fashion industry, people may not take men seriously if they are straight. They may think men who like fashion are not like other men.

To change this, we need to work slowly and carefully. We have made a lot of progress since the 1800s, but change is slow. As women get more jobs and become CEOs, people are starting to accept them more. The same is happening with men who stay home to take care of their children.

The key is to show people the good qualities of people who are often stereotyped. We should not push people to accept things too quickly. If we do, they will resist. Instead, we should show them the good qualities of these people, and they will start to accept them more.

We are at a good point right now, where people are starting to accept things more. However, we still have a long way to go. There are many areas where people are still discriminated against, not just because of their gender, but also because of where they are from or how they speak.

For example, people from rural areas may be looked down upon if they have poor grammar, even if they are very intelligent. This is another form of discrimination.

In conclusion, gender discrimination is a big problem in the US. We need to work slowly and carefully to fix it. We have made progress, but we still have a long way to go.

Marijuana was once against the law. But it's not anymore in some places. It's now like a traffic ticket. You get a fine instead of going to jail. 

This change can be good or bad. Some people think it's good because it saves money. It costs a lot to arrest people and put them in jail. It also costs money for the court and lawyers. 

Denver is a place where people are more open-minded. They think it's fine to have marijuana. They use the money to help the community. They spend it on schools, programs for older people, and food for those who are poor.

But some people don't think it's a good idea. They think it will make problems. There will be people smoking and driving. It's still not okay in many places to smoke marijuana. It will be awkward for a lot of people if it's everywhere.

Alcohol and marijuana are both bad for people. But in different ways. Alcohol can hurt your ability to drive. Marijuana can hurt your lifestyle. It can make you make bad choices.

People react differently to substances. Some people can handle them easily. Others can't. It's hard to say how marijuana will affect someone.

But both marijuana and alcohol can hurt people. They both have bad effects. It's good to be careful with them.

I am not sure about this issue. I have not made up my mind. I do not know if one side is right or the other. This is a difficult subject. It is about the relationship between church and state. It is also about how we define marriage. This is hard to do without hurting someone’s feelings.

Two people who love each other should be able to make a union. They should not be judged. The fact that some people are gay is not important. They can also make a union.

If the states can agree on this, they should make it a federal law. But making a change to the constitution is too big a deal. It should not be changed just to ban gay marriage. This is not a big enough issue to make a change to the constitution.

I was raised in a Christian home. This made me think about my views on homosexuality. I do not fully understand this issue. I have many gay friends, and I do not agree with their lifestyle. However, I think it should be legal. I do not think it should be a national issue. Each state should make its own decision about this.

I think if you live in a state that allows gay marriage, you should respect that state's decision. You chose to live there. I believe that homosexuals should have the same rights as heterosexuals. Therefore, I think gay marriage should be allowed in each state.

I have already answered this question. I do not agree with President Bush's decision to ban gay marriage. He should not make decisions for all the states. I do not think he should decide how each state should be governed.

No, I am not a supporter of President Bush on this issue.

I do not agree that the school officials overstepped their bounds. Myspace is a public place. If you put something on the internet, you should be prepared for others to see it. This includes school officials. They have the right to check Myspace to make sure students are safe. They can do this from their homes.

The school officials went on Myspace to prevent school shootings. Saving students' lives is a big responsibility of the school system. I think it is okay to check Myspace if it helps keep students safe.

Some people might think it is an invasion of privacy to check Myspace. But if it makes the school a better and safer place, I do not think it is an invasion. 

When you post something on Myspace, you should not expect to be private. Many people post things they do not want others to see. But once it is on the internet, it is hard to get it off. 

The school officials can find things you post on Myspace even if it is not under the school's name. They can use the internet to find out what students are doing.

If the school officials can use Myspace to make the school safer, I think it is okay. They should not just go on Myspace to catch students doing something wrong. 

One teacher told me that schools must make sure students are safe. We have to do drills in case of emergencies. This is to make the school a safer place.

The school officials were just trying to make the school safer. They were checking Myspace to prevent bad things from happening, like a school shooting.

I have mixed feelings about a war. At first, I supported it because I was affected by 9/11. I wanted to cause trouble for those who hurt us. However, I now think we made a mistake. We didn't think about the long-term results of our actions. We went into the war without a clear plan.

Things did not go well. We did not prepare well for the challenges we faced. War is different in their country than in ours. They fight in a savage way. They are not trying to make their country better; they just want us to leave.

I think we went to war to get revenge. The president decided to go to war because many people wanted to. We couldn't just ignore what happened and leave it alone. However, we should have had a better plan.

We didn't have unity and didn't know what we were doing. We created more problems than we solved. I don't think we are the ones to change them. They will always be the same.

We have made some progress, but not enough to stay. It will collapse when we leave. We are hurting ourselves by staying. We should not stay there forever.
